overview:
If you know exactly what your looking for, you can access our database to find an exact match. add valuable demographic/psychographic information to your file and strengthen your marketing efforts.

Email Appending / Email Matching is the process of merging a database of information on individuals containing information other than the individuals’ email addresses, with master database of email addresses in an attempt to match the email addresses with the information in the initial database.

An email appending / Email Matching process involves a business that has name, address and telephone data on its customers/prospects or other individuals. If you want to expand into email communication, then you can involve a service provider that has a database of email addresses in order to merge the data together. In this way you can have an updated database with the current email address of individuals on your marketing list.

Email Appending / Email Matching enable you to rapidly and cost-effectively improve your email marketing programs by expanding your reach, lowering your cost per contact, and increasing the net contribution and profitability of every marketing campaign.
